entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is mentioned as having a new song, indicating it has some kind of musical ability. (Excerpt: 'THE SORTING HAT'S NEW SONG')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is described as getting out of a carriage first. (Excerpt: 'He turned again to look for lit windows down by the forest, but there was definitely no sign of life within Hagrid’s cabin.')

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as having a cabin in the Forbidden Forest and Harry tries to see if there are any lights on. (Excerpt: 'but the grounds were in complete darkness. Hogwarts Castle, however, loomed ever closer: a towering mass of turrets, jet-black against the dark sky, here and there a window blazing fiery bright above them.')

entities.name: hogwarts castle
entities.description: Hogwarts Castle is described as looming ever closer with turrets and windows. (Excerpt: 'Hogwarts Castle, however, loomed ever closer: a towering mass of turrets, jet-black against the dark sky, here and there a window blazing fiery bright above them.')
